title: Dubai & Abu Dhabi
intro: A week-long journey through the dazzling skyscrapers of Dubai and the cultural landmarks of Abu Dhabi.

items.title: Arrival
items.description: Reached Orient Guest House in Dubai around 5:00 PM. Located in the historic Bastakiya area.

items.title: Ferrari World
items.description: Experienced the thrill of the world's fastest rollercoaster and other attractions at Ferrari World Abu Dhabi.

items.title: Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque
items.description: Visited the magnificent Grand Mosque, a masterpiece of Islamic architecture.

items.title: Dhow Cruise
items.description: Enjoyed a traditional Dhow cruise along the Dubai Creek, soaking in the views of the city's historic and modern skyline.

items.title: Burj Khalifa
items.description: Visited the top of the world's tallest building for breathtaking panoramic views.

items.title: Dubai Mall
items.description: Explored the massive Dubai Mall, looking at the Aquarium and fountains.

items.title: Dubai Dolphinarium
items.description: Watched the dolphin and seal show.

items.title: Desert Safari
items.description: Went on an evening desert safari including dune bashing, camel riding, and a barbecue dinner under the stars.

items.title: Bus Tour
items.description: Took a bus tour to see various city landmarks and get an overview of Dubai's rapid development.

items.title: Night Cruise
items.description: Enjoyed a relaxing night cruise, seeing the illuminated city from the water.

items.title: Dubai Museum
items.description: Visited the Dubai Museum in Al Fahidi Fort to learn about the city's transformation from a fishing village to a global metropolis.
